name: SplatterVille Mayhem
description:
Welcome to Splatterville! Now that you have made the mistake of coming here hopefully you can  make it out. Find your way through the town and find the necessary items to leave. Be aware of the locals. They  are not too friendly so you might have to fight your way through them.
